title: Patching failed
body:
Hey,
Everytime when I want to start the Alpha Client it does an Update and after a few seconds I get the message:

“Patching failed and we´re not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again. (Error code 004)

Of course I restarted the client and I also tried to run it as an administrator. I also reinstalled the client but I still get this Error.
It would be very nice if someone could help me.

~stormy5

replies.body: Have got anyone a solve? Same problem here :(

I got this problem...... but it happened in the middle of a ranked game...... I was playing, it crashed, i couldnt reconnect......... so i restarted the client......... it had to patch....... and it gave me that error and ive been trying for 2 days to fix it now xD
is there a way to go back to the regular client in order to play?
Same. It also isn't patching on the old regular client.

there's a temporary fix that worked for me 
. open the new client and at the right bottom of the client u'll find " start older client " , after that u 'll get the older client and it will update
The "patching failed and we're not sure....." is in the middle and u should click okay then comes the restart which means u don't have the opportunity to click at "Launch legacy client"

I'm having the same issue. Yesterday I had a game where it completed and LoL froze, I couldn't even pull the task manager to end the session. Today, I keep getting a loop of the Patching failed and we're not sure why. 'Please restart the client to try patching again. (Error code 004)' message. Nothing I've tried so far has worked. Legacy client also won't work.
